#labels Featured
= Installing =

  * Make sure you have ruby and python installed

  * Download [http://po-ru.com/projects/iplayer-downloader/ iplayer-dl]

  * Download iplayer-get from the *DOWNLOADS* tab, and unzip it somewhere

  * (optional) Make the script runnable from any directory:
{{{
sudo ln -s /path/to/iplayer-get.py /usr/bin/iplayer-get
}}}

To get help:
{{{
iplayer-get -h
}}}

= Running =

Add a new series as follows:
{{{
iplayer-get -a ADD_SERIES
}}}
where ADD_SERIES is the name of the series (in quotes if more than one word)

The download new episodes by running iplayer-get with no arguments
{{{
iplayer-get
}}}
Example:
{{{
     > iplayer-get -a "Doctor Who"
     > iplayer-get

     Checking series Doctor Who...                                      
     Resuming download at 0 bytes.                                                   
     Doctor Who - Series 3 - Human Nature.mov (Default)                   
     100.0%  
}}}
= How It Works =
For each series registered, iplayer-get goes to the BBC's iplayer search page and searches for the series name. Any matching results are downloaded, provided the series names match.
